## gpiochipClose() function

This closes an opened gpiochip device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gpiochipClose(handle: number): void;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handle


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
